text:
Title: The Bastard (2023) - Danish Drama with English Subtitles and Chinese Subtitles
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**Movie Info:**

* Director: Nikolaj Arcel, Anders Thomas Jensen
* Stars: Mads Mikkelsen, Nicolas Bro, Fanny Bornedal, etc.
* Genres: Drama, History
* Language: Danish, English subtitles, Chinese subtitles

**Plot Summary:**

Set in the 17th century during the reign of King Frederick III of Denmark, a poor soldier named Rudolf is given permission by the king to settle on the vast wasteland that is Dierna Island as part of an attempt to increase tax revenue for the crown. Despite the harsh conditions and resistance from local lords, Rudolf manages to build a farm and establish a small community. However, his success attracts unwanted attention from powerful enemies who will stop at nothing to take what he has built.

**Awards:**

* European Film Awards 2023 – Best Actor (Mads Mikkelsen)
* European Film Awards 2023 – Best Cinematography (Rasmus Videbæk)
* European Film Awards 2023 – Best Costume Design (Kicki Ilander)
